title: Ahaz’s Wicked Reign
summary: Ahaz becomes king of Judah and imitates the evil practices of Israel, even sacrificing his own son. He turns to Assyria for help against his enemies and alters the temple’s altar according to a pagan design, dishonoring God.

faq.question: What did King Ahaz do that angered God?
faq.answer: He practiced idolatry, sacrificed his son, and remodeled God’s altar after a pagan design.

faq.question: How did Ahaz deal with threats from other nations?
faq.answer: He made an alliance with Assyria and gave them treasure from the temple.
